note:
My posts are mostly me figuring out how to live life fully as a “later” identified neurodivergent person (Autistic + ADHD) & balancing this with chronic illness (ME/CFS or SEID, the term I prefer).

In my 40s. JUST graduated (July 2024)! 🎉 Studying for a Masters.

Interdisciplinary brain: I work best when combining two very different specialist skillsets.

Only impressed by kindness. Taoist & yogi ☯📿 White cis het female but no gender identity really feels ‘me’ on its own (she/any). England UK.

fields.name: Lifelong special interest:
fields.value: Horses: wild & feral, their behaviour, ecology, biology & wellness

fields.name: Something I’m likely to say:
fields.value: “I will carpe the fuck out of my diems until I die”
